name: Corban & Blair
tag_list: design, product-developers, carbon-neutral-frames-, stationery, lifestyle-products, australian, box-frames, marketing-folders-made-to-order--bespoke
overview:
Product developers for 21 years in stationery & fashion lifestyle collections designed twice yearly for department and independent stores.

Bespoke product solutions for marketing folders, gifts, menus, compendia, travel items and photo frames, made to order, created everyday. These can be personalised with logos.

Design philosophy is to bring attention to the environment using design and associated messages considering longevity, utility, durability and recycling. Our objective is to create style that captures memories and desire.

Corban & Blair brand established by cousins Gillian Corban & Amanda Blair and located in Sydney Australia.

Company is known for their Australian design sophistication, quality, innovation, excellent customer service, friendly and helpful staff and attention to current trends.

Corporate clients include: Saatchi & Saatchi, Westpac, The Beauty Directory, AMP, Macquarie Bank, Singelton Olgivy One.
